title: Were Portland demonstrators "abducted" by unmarked federal officers in Vance?
subtitle: The claim arose as US President Donald Trump was preparing to deploy federal law enforcement agents in Chicago and other cities.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: The federal agents, acting on orders from United States President Donald Trump in the summer of 2020, used unmarked cars to "abduction" Portland demonstrators and did not classify themselves as law enforcement during arrests.
